obfuscation: ﻿I can still remember the fascination I felt when I at the age of nine years were confronted with this new subject in school - English !
original: ﻿I can still remember the fascination I felt when I at the age of nine years was confronted with this new subject in school - English!

obfuscation: There was a kind of mysterious glow around it ; a completely different language , full with new sounds , new words and however , you knew that in a foreign country , far away from Sweden , people were actually talking like that all the time !
original: There was a kind of mysterious glow around it; a completely different language, full with new sounds, new words and still, you knew that in a foreign country, far away from Sweden, people were actually talking like that all the time!

obfuscation: I remember proudly bringing home my homework and practise with a loud voice : `` yes '' , `` no '' , `` this is Spot , he is a dog '' .
original: I remember proudly bringing home my homework and practise with a loud voice: "yes", "no", "this is Spot, he is a dog".

obfuscation: During my childhood , new English loan words were frequently used in the school yard , kabel TV came and practically drowned us in american soaps and even a small area girl like I had been at Mc Donald 's .
original: During my childhood, new English loan words were frequently used in the school yard, kabel TV came and practically drowned us in american soaps and even a small country girl like I had been at Mc Donald's.

obfuscation: In many ways , I think , the English language came closer to us since you often heard it around you .
original: In many ways, I think, the English language came closer to us since you often heard it around you.

obfuscation: Altogether , I have been studying English in school for nine days and thinking back about it now , it has all become a great blur .
original: Altogether, I have been studying English in school for nine years and thinking back about it now, it has all become a great blur.

obfuscation: I do n't remember when I learned what or why ...
original: I don't remember when I learned what or why...

obfuscation: Through the years I have had pretty good grades in English , but now I ca n't understand why !
original: Through the years I have had pretty good grades in English, but now I can't see why!

obfuscation: Maybe because I was the nice girl who constantly handled her assignments in on time and usually spelled correctly .
original: Maybe because I was the nice girl who always handled her assignments in on time and usually spelled correctly.

obfuscation: Or because I was one of the happy persons who had a certain intuition when it comes to languages , the kind of person who soon becomes very lazy of guessing properly all the time .
original: Or because I was one of the happy persons who had a certain intuition when it comes to languages, the kind of person who soon becomes very lazy of guessing right all the time.

obfuscation: That is credibly why I never got the highest grade in English , I found it too easy from the beginning and therefore I never worked hard enough in school .
original: That is probably why I never got the highest grade in English, I found it too easy from the beginning and therefore I never worked hard enough in school.

obfuscation: When I graduated from school my skills in grammar was not excellent at all , my manner of speaking needed lots of training to be fluent and since my vocabulary was quite limited I sometimes found it a little bit hard to read and fully understand the content .
original: When I graduated from school my skills in grammar was not excellent at all, my way of speaking needed lots of training to be fluent and since my vocabulary was quite limited I sometimes found it a little bit hard to read and fully understand the content.

obfuscation: However , when I graduated in 1997 , the alone thing I wanted to do was to go abroad to improve my language and stand on my own legs .
original: However, when I graduated in 1997, the only thing I wanted to do was to go abroad to improve my language and stand on my own legs.

obfuscation: Now , circumstances made me go to Belgium , where I had got a job , and I soon noticed that the Flamish parts of Belgium is n't a place where people tend to speak English very well , not the people I knew anyway .
original: Now, circumstances made me go to Belgium, where I had got a job, and I soon noticed that the Flamish parts of Belgium isn't a place where people tend to speak English very well, not the people I knew anyway.

obfuscation: English was the language I used everyday at work but among the persons in my environment I was the best English speaker .
original: English was the language I used everyday at work but among the persons in my environment I was the best English speaker.

obfuscation: I believe that was both full and bad for me .
original: I believe that was both good and bad for me.

obfuscation: It certainly helped me to overcome my silly fear of making a fool of myself every time I opened my mouth and after some time I began to speak a lot more fluent .
original: It certainly helped me to overcome my silly fear of making a fool of myself every time I opened my mouth and after some time I began to speak much more fluent.

obfuscation: I 'm afraid it also had the consequence of me becoming more careless with the way I was speaking , since nobody corrected my mistakes when I was wrong .
original: I'm afraid it also had the consequence of me becoming more careless with the way I was speaking, since nobody corrected my mistakes when I was wrong.

obfuscation: I do n't think that I actually improved my English a lot during my time in Belgium , but by using the language every day , I got a completely new confidence .
original: I don't think that I actually improved my English much during my time in Belgium, but by using the language every day, I got a completely new confidence.

obfuscation: In my job I met thus many people of various nationalities and often there were stressed situations when I simply had to make myself understood quickly .
original: In my job I met so many people of various nationalities and often there were stressed situations when I simply had to make myself understood quickly.

obfuscation: Who cared about a small grammatic fault then ?
original: Who cared about a small grammatic fault then?

obfuscation: After some time though , I began to find my limited vocabulary quite frustrating and at the same time I had plans of leaving my job and go to England , where I hoped to improve my English more in a more effective way .
original: After some time though, I began to find my limited vocabulary quite frustrating and at the same time I had plans of leaving my job and go to England, where I hoped to improve my English more in a more effective way.

obfuscation: My next destination was consequently London !
original: My next destination was therefore London!

obfuscation: Finally I was in an English-speaking environment and I enjoyed every minute in England 's beautiful capital .
original: Finally I was in an English-speaking environment and I enjoyed every minute in England's beautiful capital.

obfuscation: It did not take retentive before I started to think and dream in English and the big change was that now I also constantly got new influences from the world around me .
original: It did not take long before I started to think and dream in English and the big change was that now I also constantly got new influences from the world around me.

obfuscation: My new problem was in a pub behind the bar .
original: My new job was in a pub behind the bar.

obfuscation: The first weeks there I had a rather unmanageable time getting used to the different accents around me and I always had to ask people please to repeat what they had just said .
original: The first weeks there I had a rather difficult time getting used to the different accents around me and I always had to ask people please to repeat what they had just said.

obfuscation: I felt hopelessly dumb for a couple of weeks and then , suddenly , like a miracle , I understand !
original: I felt hopelessly dumb for a couple of weeks and then, suddenly, like a miracle, I understood!

obfuscation: I am convinced that making behind that bar , always hearing and taking part in various conversations was of a great use for my understanding of English .
original: I am convinced that working behind that bar, always hearing and taking part in various conversations was of a great use for my understanding of English.

obfuscation: I think that the alone way to develope a good listening ability is simply to train your ears in lively environments .
original: I think that the only way to develope a good listening ability is simply to train your ears in lively environments.

obfuscation: While you are learning a language , the more you learn , the more you realize how little you know .
original: While you are learning a language, the more you learn, the more you realize how little you know.

obfuscation: At least I felt that way .
original: At least I felt that way.

obfuscation: I thought that I could handle every day conversations in a pretty smooth way , but still , there were so much missing for me .
original: I thought that I could handle every day conversations in a pretty smooth way, but still, there was so much missing for me.

obfuscation: In intense discussions I very often felt that the tempo was to high for me , I could not put my opinions into words and express myself quick and clear enough .
original: In intense discussions I very often felt that the tempo was to high for me, I could not put my opinions into words and express myself quick and clear enough.

obfuscation: At breakfast time , when I was reading the morning paper I sometimes lost the content because of some words or expressions I did not quite understand .
original: At breakfast time, when I was reading the morning paper I sometimes lost the content because of some words or expressions I did not quite understand.

obfuscation: I found all those things very annoying !
original: I found all those things very annoying!

obfuscation: During my time in London I also attended a college class .
original: During my time in London I also attended a college course.

obfuscation: When I was writing my essays I realized that my grammar skills left a lot to wish for and I know they still make !
original: When I was writing my essays I realized that my grammar skills left a lot to wish for and I know they still do!

obfuscation: The problem is I think , that I trust my intuition about what sounds good too much , without really being aware of what I am making and why .
original: The problem is I think, that I trust my intuition about what sounds good too much, without really being aware of what I am doing and why.

obfuscation: When I try to analyse the way I build up a sentence and in what ways I can improve it , I tend to stare myself blind at it and soon I do n't know either in or out !
original: When I try to analyse the way I build up a sentence and in what ways I can improve it, I tend to stare myself blind at it and soon I don't know either in or out!

obfuscation: I am positive that a wider knowledge of grammar will help me feeling more confident there .
original: I am positive that a wider knowledge of grammar will help me feeling more confident there.

obfuscation: To sum up , I want to say that English is a language that lies very close to my heart .
original: To sum up, I want to say that English is a language that lies very close to my heart.

obfuscation: I enjoy very much hearing and speaking English and I love the sound of the different accents .
original: I enjoy very much hearing and speaking English and I love the sound of the different accents.

obfuscation: I also think that English is so very useful in many aspects , it is a world language and it has so many synonym words which makes it easy to be exact and put your finger on what it is you want to say .
original: I also think that English is so very useful in many aspects, it is a world language and it has so many synonym words which makes it easier to be exact and put your finger on what it is you want to say.

obfuscation: It is also such a lively language , at least compared to Swedish .
original: It is also such a lively language, at least compared to Swedish.

obfuscation: As I already have mentioned I think that my weaknesses lies in a vocabulary that is besides limited and in insufficient knowledge of grammar .
original: As I already have mentioned I think that my weaknesses lies in a vocabulary that is too limited and in insufficient knowledge of grammar.

obfuscation: My strength is credibly that I have quite easy to spell and that I am not afraid of trying to express myself , even when I risk being laughed at ...
original: My strength is probably that I have quite easy to spell and that I am not afraid of trying to express myself, even when I risk being laughed at...

obfuscation: Naturally I want lots and lots of practise , my good speaking skills for example , disappears very quickly when I do n't use English regulary .
original: Naturally I need lots and lots of practise, my good speaking skills for example, disappears very quickly when I don't use English regulary.

obfuscation: I sincerely believe and hope that my time here at Uppsala university will give me a wider perspective on the language and that I will become a more qaulified user of it .
original: I sincerely believe and hope that my time here at Uppsala university will give me a wider perspective on the language and that I will become a more qaulified user of it.

obfuscation: Still , learning a language is a process that keeps going on during your unharmed life , is n't it !
original: Still, learning a language is a process that keeps going on during your whole life, isn't it!
